alert.note: Alert for Branch; Hillsdale (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 16 at 2:56PM EST until February 18 at 12:00AM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON THURSDAY TO MIDNIGHT EST THURSDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation into early afternoon followed by heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 10 inches and ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph with considerable blowing snow. * WHERE...Portions of northern Indiana and southwest Michigan. * WHEN...From noon Thursday to midnight EST Thursday night. * IMPACTS...Travel will become very difficult. The hazardous conditions will impact the Thursday evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
